text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @PrisonPlanet Because covid19 was a freaking farce. Yeah people died but the media blew it all out of proportion to cause fear and anxiety and they are doing the same thing now. I realized long ago that the media was just propaganda and now I try to wake up others.
